name: cr-reminder
title: CR Review / QA Duration Monitor
description: Measures how long issues stay in Review/QA pipelines (ZenHub) via GraphQL or REST.

input.title: Input
input.description: Configure data source (GraphQL workspace or REST repositories) and pipelines.

slackWebhookUrl.title: Slack Webhook URL
slackWebhookUrl.description: Slack webhook URL to send notifications about pending reviews.

zenhubToken.title: ZenHub Token
zenhubToken.description: Personal access token for ZenHub (GraphQL + REST).

useGraphql.title: Use GraphQL
useGraphql.description: If true, use GraphQL workspace-based queries; otherwise REST board endpoints.

graphqlEndpoint.title: GraphQL Endpoint
graphqlEndpoint.description: ZenHub GraphQL endpoint URL (for GraphQL mode).

workspaceIds.title: Workspace IDs (GraphQL mode)
workspaceIds.description: List of ZenHub workspace IDs (required when useGraphql is true).

targetPipelines.title: Target Pipelines
targetPipelines.description: Pipeline names to measure duration in (e.g., Review/QA, Review, QA).

maxIssues.title: Max Issues
maxIssues.description: Upper limit of issues processed per workspace or repository.

sendEmptyReport.title: Send Empty Report
sendEmptyReport.description: If true, send 'all good' message to Slack when no issues to report; if false, don't send anything.
